description: This file initializes a knowledge base from an S3 document and creates an agent to query it, specifically related to recipes and cooking instructions.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with the knowledge base to answer questions.

classes.name: S3TextKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that loads text data from an S3 bucket.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A vector database interface using PostgreSQL with pgvector extension.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the index.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a query, optionally in markdown format.
